Detailed Description

DynamicLayout is a text layout that updates itself as the text is edited.

This is used by widgets to control text layout. You should not need to use this class directly unless you are implementing your own widget or custom display object, or need to call int, int, float, float, gaia.graphics.Paint) Canvas.drawText() directly.
